snippet: An officer opened fire on the driver after he tried to flee and appeared to reach for a weapon, the police said.
abstract: New York City Police officer shoots man in the torso as tries to flee during a traffic stop on Staten Island; police say man appeared to have reached for a weapon.
lead_paragraph: An officer opened fire on the driver after he tried to flee and appeared to reach for a weapon, the police said.

headline.seo: Police Shoot Man During a Traffic Stop on Staten Island
